abstract: Róbert Vittek (born 1 April 1982) is a Slovak football player who currently plays for ŠK Slovan Bratislava.With 23 goals in 80 matches since 2001, Vittek is the highest-scorer ever for the Slovakia national football team. He played for them at the 2010 FIFA World Cup, in which he scored four goals.
